problems.title: Longest Turbulent Subarray (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given an integer array arr, return the length of a maximum size turbulent subarray of arr. A subarray is turbulent if the comparison sign flips between each adjacent pair of elements.

Input Format:
First line: integer n.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print the length of the longest turbulent subarray.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
